"Dragonkin's Disease":
"The ARKS researcher Aki and her
assistant Light have traveled to
Amduscia, home of the mighty Dragonkin.
This race been successfully repelling the
Darkers despite refusing ARKS help, but
Aki says that the number of berserk
Dragonkin has skyrocketed recently.

――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated"
